SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate FROM board_review
OR writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) SELECT case count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE MAX(seq) + 1 END, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, curdate() FROM board_review
